page.title: 17The Amenities of Otford.
page.content: The inhabitants of Otford village are fortunate in the range of amenities available. Four churches - Anglican, Methodist, Roman Catholic and a Non- Conformist Chapel serve the village. A medical group practice and a dental surgery, as well as a child clinic cater for its health; a bank and a sub- post office provide financial facilities and newsagents provide a delivered daily paper. There are nine food shops and several specialist shops whilst two restaurants, a cafe and four public houses provide for the hungry and thirsty. Car parking is difficult with limited space but a train service to Victoria makes this a commuter area. A County library branch, a county Primary school and two private schools as well as playing fields serve the village.
